resources.string: I am a Bsc Computer science graduate majoring in the field of Software Engineering. I had an interest in programming at an early age and take pride in software development and see it as an art form to design , code and deploy fully working softwares. I have a passion to learn new concepts and technological advancements and breakthroughs in the IT field.I do full stack android development ,Web development ,Software consultancy , Networking and computer Security and forensics consultancy which I learned a lot of programming languages over the years and do lots of projects to perfect my coding skills . I also participate in lots of online tech forums and communities to try providing solutions to tech related queries and sharing tech ideas and findings to further broaden my skills and knowledge base. I also engage my immediate community and help in solving tech related problems and provide viable solutions. I believe to have attained problem solving skills and resiliency to tackle any task thrown my way.
